overview: Do you like animals and dinosaurs? So does Elmo! Over 3 hours of stories, including Elmo going on a Sesame Street Safari to see all kinds of animals, Grover hilariously trying to throw a Farm Fiesta but realizing that farm animals don't like what he likes, and Paleontologist Elmo learning lots of dino-facts. Includes bonus feature Dinosaurs!
title: Sesame Street: Elmo Loves Animals
